title: Engadi Porandha Lyrics Vanakkam Chennai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Engadi Porandha
Singers: Anirudh, Andrea
Lyrics: Vignesh Shivan
Music: Anirudh Ravichander
Movie: Vanakkam Chennai (2013)		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Ye Engadi Porandha, engadi valarndha
engai engadi
Ye eppadi porandha eppadi valarndha
eppadi eppadi

Monday nee mundam
Tuesday nee dhandam
Wednesday thaedi, vandha kandam
Thursday nee mokka
Friday nee bokka
Saturday sanda, pottu theerkka
Sweet dog-u neethaan,
periya kallu naanthaan

Keeri pulla neethaan
snake-u naanthaan
Akthar-u neethaan
Scahin naanthaan
Antony neethaan
Baashaa naanthaan..

Ye Engadi .
Ye engadi , engadi engadi..
ayyo engadi engadi engadi ..

Unna paathaale BP yerum
en happy life sad-ah maarum
Nee Osaama na, naan Obaama de
un death-u en kaiyla de

Un facea naan paarthaa podhum
en bad tima-u start-u aagum
munna varaadha da
moonji kaataadha da
en koobatha thoondaadha da..

Vaa vaa vaya konjam moodu
free advice veeta vittu odu
Vaa da vaa gramathu aadu
baliyagaama oora vittu odu

Ye Engadi Porandha, engadi valarndha
engai engadi
Ye eppadi porandha eppadi valarndha
eppadi eppadi

Monday nee mundam
Tuesday nee dhandam
Wednesday thaedi, vandha kandam
Thursday nee mokka
Friday nee bokka
Saturday sanda, pottu theerkka
Sweet dog-u neethaan,
periya kallu naanthaan

snake-u naanthaan

Scahin naanthaan
Antony neethaan
Baashaa naanthaan..
